#File Generated by Hans J. Johnson
#Please contact hans-johnson@uiowa.edu for making enhancments/corrections
PROJECT(NIFTIIOLIB)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${ZNZLIB_SOURCE_DIR})
SET(NIFTIIOLIB_SRC nifti1_io.c)

ADD_LIBRARY(${PACKAGE_PREFIX}niftiio ${NIFTIIOLIB_SRC} )
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES( ${PACKAGE_PREFIX}niftiio ${PACKAGE_PREFIX}znz)

IF(UNIX)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PACKAGE_PREFIX}niftiio -lm)
ENDIF(UNIX)

INSTALL_TARGETS(/lib/InsightToolkit ${PACKAGE_PREFIX}niftiio)
INSTALL_FILES(/include/niftiio "(\\.h)$")
